name: PEW PEW (Flyingpie)
description:
Pew Pew !

aTop-Down Shooter / dungeon crawler made by a guy trying to learn game making.

crawl in dungeons... what do you mean we only have one ? ehhhh crawl one dungeon for now and shoot hexagons EVIL hexagons.

the game isnt finished but i will come back to it someday. 

cover made by the amazing artist SpaekStatic u can find him on twitter @SpaekStatic
